biography.bio: Josefine Preuß was born on January 13, 1986 in Zehdenick, Brandenburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Family Mix (2006), Türkisch für Anfänger (2012) and Rouge rubis (2013).
biography.name: Josefine Preuß

biography.bio: Jacob Matschenz was born in 1984 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Wave (2008), Move (2012) and À la frontière (2007).
biography.name: Jacob Matschenz

biography.bio: Volker Bruch was born on March 9, 1980 in Munich, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Reader (2008), The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008) and Young Goethe in Love (2010).
biography.name: Volker Bruch

biography.placeOfBirth: Kwassitz, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia [now Kvasice, Moravia, Czech Republic]
biography.birthName: Friedrich Ernst Peter Paul Maria Graf von Thun und Hohenstein
biography.bio: Friedrich von Thun was born on June 30, 1942 in Kwassitz, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia as Friedrich Ernst Peter Paul Maria Graf von Thun und Hohenstein. He is an actor and director, known for Schindler's List (1993), Hitler - La naissance du mal (2003) and Amen (2002). He was previously married to Gabriele (Gaby) Schniewind and Gabriele (Yella) Bleyler.
biography.name: Friedrich von Thun

biography.bio: Dietmar Bär was born on February 5, 1961 in Dortmund, Germany. He is an actor, known for Tatort (1970), Guys and Balls (2004) and Kehrtwende (2011). He has been married to Maren Geißler since April 15, 2009.
biography.name: Dietmar Bär

biography.bio: Sebastian Hülk was born on January 10, 1975 in Bottrop, Germany. He is an actor, known for Inglourious Basterds (2009), War Horse (2011) and Hanna (2011).
biography.name: Sebastian Hülk

biography.bio: Lucas Gregorowicz was born on August 31, 1976 in London, England. He is an actor, known for Lammbock (2001), Soul Kitchen (2009) and Le miracle de Berne (2003).
biography.name: Lucas Gregorowicz

biography.bio: Ernst Stötzner was born in 1952 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. He is an actor, known for Underground (1995), Frantz (2016) and Klimt (2006). He is married to Dörte Lyssewski. They have one child.
biography.name: Ernst Stötzner

biography.bio: Roeland Wiesnekker was born on November 25, 1967 in Zürich, Switzerland. He is an actor, known for Strähl (2004), 3096 Jours (2013) and Il était une fois un meurtre (2010).
biography.name: Roeland Wiesnekker

biography.bio: Tómas Lemarquis was born on August 3, 1977 in Iceland. He is an actor, known for Noi l'albinos (2003), Snowpiercer - le transperceneige (2013) and 3 Days to Kill (2014).
biography.name: Tómas Lemarquis

biography.bio: Sven Pippig was born on May 27, 1963 in Hof, Bavaria, Germany. He was an actor, known for Quatre minutes (2006), Lore (2012) and Something to Remind Me (2001). He died on September 25, 2013 in Hof.
biography.name: Sven Pippig

biography.bio: Carlo Ljubek was born on May 21, 1976 in Bocholt, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Hrvoje-Carlo Ljubek. He is an actor, known for The World Is Big (2008), Shahada (2010) and La ligne de coeur (2004).
biography.name: Carlo Ljubek

biography.bio: Stipe Erceg was born on October 30, 1974 in Split, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Unknown (2011), The Edukators (2004) and The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008).
biography.name: Stipe Erceg

biography.bio: Laura de Boer was born on February 26, 1983 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Forgotten (2012), A Dangerous Fortune (2016) and Immer wieder anders (2014).
biography.name: Laura de Boer

biography.bio: Lore Richter was born in 1985 in Germany. She is an actress, known for Hanna's Journey (2013), Nahende Ferne (2011) and In uns das Universum (2015).
biography.name: Lore Richter

biography.placeOfBirth: Maishofen bei Zell am See, Austria
biography.bio: Gottfried Breitfuss was born on December 17, 1958 in Maishofen bei Zell am See, Austria. He is an actor, known for The Princess and the Warrior (2000), Struggle (2003) and My Brother the Vampire (2001).
biography.name: Gottfried Breitfuss

biography.bio: Corinna Kirchhoff was born on March 9, 1958 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. She is an actress, known for Die Besucher (2012), Sous toi, la ville (2010) and Riskante Patienten (2012).
biography.name: Corinna Kirchhoff

biography.bio: Uwe Preuss was born in 1961 in Dresden, Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Deutschland 83 (2015), The Nightmare (2015) and Patong Girl (2014).
biography.name: Uwe Preuss

biography.bio: Lucas Prisor was born on September 23, 1983 in Hannover, Lower Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Elle (2016), Un sac de billes (2017) and Diplomatie (2014).
biography.name: Lucas Prisor

biography.bio: Muriel Wimmer was born in August 1994. She is an actress, known for Little Thirteen (2012), Les enfants de la villa Emma (2016) and Spieltrieb (2013).
biography.name: Muriel Wimmer

episodes.title: Eine Wunde für Tilla
episodes.plot: 1386. In an alpine city in Schwaben (southern Wurtemberg), council member and leading merchant Eckhardt Willinger fears a illness may be fatal and asks his son Otfried to save his soul by posthumously bringing his heart in pilgrimage to Copostella to atone for a lowlife's death by greedy neglect. Appalled that not he but his future brother in law is to inherit father's position, Otfried asphyxiates Eckhart and agrees a double marriage for him and his sister with another council member and his daughter, including a secret, illegal league with mighty neighbor Bavaria. ...

episodes.title: Santiago de Compostela
